priv.lucife.utils.core.io

类 IOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • priv.lucife.utils.core.io.IOUtil

  • @UBTCompatible
public abstract class IOUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    简化 io tasks
    作者:
    Lucifer Wong

        java.io.IOException - IO出错

      • flush

        public static void flush(java.io.Flushable f)
        flush 一个 Flushable A Flushable is a destination of data that can be flushed. The flush method is invoked to write any buffered output to the underlying stream.
        参数:
        f - Flushable

                     throws java.io.IOException

        参数:

        bytes - the bytes to send
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO出错
